original: Hetuṁ parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)
analyzed: hetum paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na paritta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sabbattha tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)
analyzed: hetum mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na mahaggata ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sabbattha tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum appamāṇa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na appamāṇa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
